pageProduct.name: Avene Mineral Tinted Compact Cream SPF50 Beige 10g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avène Tinted Compact Cream SPF50 Beige smoothly melts onto the skin to even out the complexion and conceal skin imperfections, providing a non-greasy, matte finish. Suitable for everyday light tinted coverage, as well as coverage for acne, rosacea, pigmentation, recent scars and post-surgery. Formulated with mineral filters and offering broad spectrum protection against UVB and UVA, while respecting sensitive skin.
Combined with Pre-tocopheryl, a Vitamin E precursor and powerful antioxidant, skin cells are protected from free radicals.
Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and fragrance free.
Apply in the morning.

Common Uses

Tinted compact, high protection SPF 50 FACE. For all types of sensitive skin (fair to medium)

Ingredients

DIMETHICONE. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (NANO). HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891). PHENYL TRIMETHICONE. ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE. ZINC OXIDE (NANO). SQUALANE. TALC. ETHYLHEXYL HYDROXYSTEARATE. POLYETHYLENE. IRON OXIDES (CI 77492) (CI 77491) (CI 77499). POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE. SILICA. POLYGLYCERYL-3. DIISOSTEARATE. ALUMINA. STEARIC ACID. AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). BEESWAX (CERA ALBA). BHT. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX (CERA MICROCRISTALLINA). PHENOXYETHANOL. TOCOPHEROL. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE. TRIBEHENIN. TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYSILANE. WATER (AQUA).

Directions

Before sun exposure, apply to face and neck using makeup sponge (included), either by itself or after a serum.
